verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Higher, higher, higher, higher, higher,
Higher, higher, lift up Jesus higher.
Higher, higher, higher, higher, higher,
Higher, higher, lift up Jesus higher.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lower, lower, lower, lower, lower,
Lower, lower, lower Satan lower.
Lower, lower, lower, lower, lower,
Lower, lower, lower Satan lower.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Cast your burdens onto Jesus,
He cares for you.
Cast your burdens onto Jesus,
He cares for you.
